posts.post_content: Looking for a nicely centered green Cobb with good registry.   Willing to pay for back scarcity to.  Want to have some special cards for my collection..  Please send me an email for what you have.   Email  jcclarkee at hotmail dot com.

Find them like this..from this very BST section not long ago :)
They come up...

[IMG]https://luckeycards.com/greencobb.jpg[/IMG]
Sorry, misremembered. Troy Rambo has the 3, not sure if he's a member here.
